mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT 'SPECIMEN' subject, '1' pid, 'TISSUE' id, 'TISSUE' name, ORDR_DIRECT_DT time, ORDR_CD ordrCd, -- 처방코드 EXAM_CD examCd, -- 검사코드, IFNULL(EXAM_NO,'Unknwon') examNo, -- 검사번호, IFNULL(SPCN_NO,'Unknwon') spcnNo, -- 검체번호, SPCN_EXAM_ORDR_TYP_CD spcnExamOrdrTypCd -- 검체검사처방유형코드 FROM SSSPMORDR -- 검체검사처방기본 WHERE RESCH_PAT_ID = #{patientId}
